snippet.title: Knight Hero 2 Revenge idle RPG. Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
This is the mythic sequel to Knight Hero, unfolding 2000 years later. The once-heroic Knight rests peacefully, but even in death, new enemies haunt him. Now, you are a mummy who was in a deep slumber inside an ancient pyramid specially built for you until hunters seeking ancient relics entered the sanctuary, awakening you. 

Android - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.almagames.idle.platformer.mummy
iOS - https://apps.apple.com/ua/app/knight-hero-2-ancient-rage/id6467384630
